title: Bruce McLeod (rugby union)
text: Bruce Edward McLeod (30 January 1940 – 1 May 1996) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Hooker">hooker</a>, McLeod represented <a href="Counties%20Manukau%20Rugby%20Union">Counties</a> at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, from 1964 to 1970. He played 46 matches for the All Blacks including 24 internationals.
